item.title: Asynchronous font loading
item.description: The characters you’re reading right now are rendered in a font called Ubuntu. It’s a pretty populare one. I’m also using the Merriweather font, in the homepage, right under my face, and in a few other places. Aren’t they nice? Hardly not! However fonts are generally heavy resources to load… and having to load more of them may negatively affect loading performance of a website. In particular, there are two different problems:
